module.name: Conference Pro
module.description: COMMERCIAL MODULE REQUIRES A LICENSE FOR IT TO FUNCTION. Please visit www.schmoozecom.com/oss.php Adds ability to manage Conference Room settings into the User Control Panel and also to create Conference IVRs
module.changelog: *12.0.23* FREEPBX-8148 Some settings are not directly applicable from users in UCP without a amportal reload *12.0.22* Force talking events on for all conferences, not just IVRs *12.0.21* Visual button for more clarity and contact manager support *12.0.19* Licensing technique fixes *12.0.18* Change functionality for UCP *12.0.17* UCP work and tweaks *12.0.16* FREEI-241 Pinless Conference Inviting From UCP *12.0.15* Cleanup for UCP *12.0.14* Updating for realtime events *12.0.13* FREEPBX-7892 *12.0.12* Undefined index cleanup in UCP *12.0.11* License Fixes *12.0.9* More work in UCP *12.0.8* Restructure Parts of UCP *12.0.7* Cosmetic changes in UCP *12.0.6* Fix to Licensing *12.0.5* Testing Licensing *12.0.4* Testing Licensing *12.0.3* Move Functionality to BMO *12.0.2* Require music not musc *12.0.1* UCP Module Support *2.11.0.13* Sales cleanup *2.11.0.10* Fix conference list ivr from showing as a bad dest *2.11.0.9* #6823 *2.11.0.8* Fix spelling issue *2.11.0.7* Fix issue where sales page was being cut off *2.11.0.6* Fix sales display when not licensed *2.11.0.5* Doing a reload as well. *2.11.0.3* Fix bugs, add name, pin, adminpin, add js checks, add sales page *2.11.0.2* Fix ARI crashing on uninstall issues
